narrative.title: 1Re Division Fran Aise Libre - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: French Free French Infantry Division (Brigade Group) deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Free French brigade group operating under British Eighth Army command. Specialized in defensive operations with mixed colonial troops (French, North African, Foreign Legion, Pacific Islands). Limited offensive capability due to lack of armor and heavy equipment.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Veteran troops from Bir Hakeim defense
Integration with British Eighth Army logistics and command
